actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide taxpayers with greater notice of any unlawful inspection or disclosure of their return or return information.
short_title: Taxpayer Privacy Protection Improvement Act of 1999
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Taxpayer Privacy Protection Improvement Act of 1999 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to move up the time by which the Secretary of the Treasury must notify a taxpayer of an unlawful inspection and disclosure of the taxpayer's return and return information. Changes such notification deadline from the time any person is criminally charged with unlawful inspection and disclosure to the time any person is referred by the Secretary to the Attorney General for criminal investigation involving such an offense.

titles.title: Taxpayer Privacy Protection Improvement Act of 1999
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide taxpayers with greater notice of any unlawful inspection or disclosure of their return or return information.
